adjective.definition: Involving mutual assistance in working towards a common goal.
adjective.example: Every member of the team has to be cooperative.

noun.definition: A farm, business, or other organization which is owned and run jointly by its members, who share the profits or benefits.
noun.example: He is a member of the housing cooperative.

verb.definition: Act jointly; work toward the same end.
verb.example: The leaders promised to cooperate in ending the violence.

verb.definition: Assist someone or comply with their requests.

usage_examples: The students were very cooperative in class.
They formed a cooperative to sell their produce.
